extensionAttribute.description: Lists out any exemptions configured in mSCP
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh ###### # mSCP-BaselineExemptions.sh # Written by Jordan Burnette (jburnette@vcu.edu) # Date Created 2022.03.31 # Last modified 2022.07.26 by Jordan Burnette ###### Description # Determines the baseline version being used and lists out any exemptions that are deployed to the machine. ######
baselineVersion=$(ls -l /Library/Preferences | /usr/bin/grep 'org.*.audit.plist' | /usr/bin/awk '{print $NF}')
auditfile="/Library/Managed Preferences/${baselineVersion}" /usr/bin/plutil -convert xml1 "${auditfile}"
if [[ $(/usr/bin/grep "<key>finding</result>" "${auditfile}" 2> /dev/null) ]] ; then result="$(/usr/bin/defaults read "${auditfile}" 2> /dev/null | /usr/bin/grep -B3 "exempt = 1" | /usr/bin/grep "{" | /usr/bin/cut -d '"' -f2 | tail -n +2)" else result="" fi
/bin/echo "<result>${result}</result>"
